page.title: 06POLICING THE DEARNE AREA.
page.content: {Wombwell Main Police Station}deals with our Area. The building is only 12 months old and it was opened in 1984. The building has got very high security measures;for example, big cameras watch you as you enter the main door. They have five cars but no vans or bikes because they say they cost too much. They have five {Chevettes}and one {Cavalier;}the Cavalier is for speed.The under water search unit is based here along with special marksmen and eight special constables. The main types of{crime}in this Area are petty crimes like shoplifting and domestic quarrels; sometimes there are a few big robberies or a murder but these are {rare.
